recipesJson.name: (V2) Kiberry Yogurt by Kilo Eliquids #REMIXMONTH
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: This is the second version of Kiberry Yogurt that is more in line with the original tastes. (V1 IS WAYYYY Better)

reviews.text: Off the mix. i find the kiwi double is too strong. I think maybe kiwi should be 3% and ripe strawberry 4%
